what's the default kernel version in ubu: 6.06 and the default installed kernel is 2.6.15-23, the current kernel (after a system update) is 2.6.15-25.
While the -XX number may change, the base kernel will always be 2.6.15.

Unfortunately, if your video isn't working with the Desktop CD, all I can suggest is a text install using the Alternatives CD.  I don't believe there is facility for tweaking video settings using the live CD.
